stepTitle: A cylinder is leaking water but you are unable to determine at what rate. The cylinder has a height of $$2$$ $$m$$ and a radius of $$2$$ $$m$$.
stepBody: Find the rate at which the water is leaking out of the cylinder if the rate at which the height is decreasing is $$10$$ $$\frac{cm}{min}$$ when the height is $$1$$ $$m$$.
